title: Causes of HRE's decline as pol pwr 1517-1648

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the reasons for the decline of the Holy Roman Empire as a force in European politics in the period 1517 to 1648.

Is well organized.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
